summary:
PROFILE
A team player, innovative, with good communication skills. I have relevant facilitation skills and experience in bringing stakeholders (both in the public and private sectors) in the fields of agriculture and food systems together to form linkages that surpass the routine process to create sustainable business solutions that benefit all stakeholders. I am looking for the opportunity to work in an organization which aims at developing sustainable businesses in the fields of agriculture, food, sustainability, and climate in emerging markets preferably Africa and Asia. I have relevant research experience and research skills

Education 
MSc Development and Rural Innovation
Wageningen University and Research Netherland
Themes; Sustainability, communication, responsible innovation, facilitation, system thinking, risk communication, development theories, rural sociology, short food chain

BSc Agricultural Extension
University of Ghana Accra, (2016 - 2020)
First Class Honors with a GPA 3.7 out of 4
Thesis topic; Assessing maize farmers’ knowledge, perception and management practices of Fall Army Worm in the Awutu Senya West district

OTHER CERTIFICATES
Professional Certificate in International Development and European Union (May 2022) 
The European School for Leadership Development 

WORK EXPERIENCE 

Teaching/Research Assistance
University of Ghana
In these research studies, my role was mainly to support with literature reviews, research design, development of questionnaires, data collection and analysis and drafting of reports and papers

Assessing maize farmers’ knowledge, attitude, and practices on fall army worm in Ghana, my Undergraduate student project supervised by Dr. Daniel Adu Ankrah of theDept. of Agric Ext

Factors influencing the adoption of Yam Variety; CRI Ahuodinfo in the Sekyere Odumasi District of Ghana. I
supervised this research of Miss Brightina Klenam Adedia

Assessment of on Farm Practices for the Safe Use of Wastewater in Urban Vegetable Production, a research
project led by Dr, Nana Afranaa Kwapong of the Dept. of Agric. Ext.

President/Founder
Africa Centre for Youth in Agriculture Samreboi, Ghana
I served as a board chairman for the two main outreach projects of the NGO;
The Extension to farmer outreach project, in this project we  organized sixteen sessions of trainee programs for small scale farmers on various Good Agricultural Practice.

The high school outreach project, through this outreach programs,

education.field_of_study: Agriculture, Agriculture Operations, and Related Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Research Practice-Internship         Ukraine & Netherlands                                           Rural Sociology.
 Lead Research on the project; SHORT FOOD SUPPLY CHAIN IN UKRAINE.  This project is being executed to support Ukraine become food secure in the War.  It was led by the GIZ, the FAO, and WUR
My role on this project has been                                     Project Coordinator; connecting all Stakeholders together and coordinating all project activities.                                  Lead researcher; Conducting systemic literature review on short food supply chain implementation in conflict areas.  
Developed stakeholder mapping tool for Ukrainian Municipalities. For tracking Stakeholders in the food supply chain of Ukraine municipalities and bring them together to develop sustainable and beneficial supply chains
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

company.name: Africa Centre for Youth in Agriculture

profile_positions.company: Africa Centre for Youth in Agriculture
profile_positions.description:
Served as a Project Manager for the 
1.	On the farmers-extension-project; we organized sixteen sessions of trainee programs for small-scale farmers on various Good Agricultural Practices. Training 106 farmers in total.  
We connected young farmers to relevant stakeholders (financial service providers, market women, researchers, and iterant traders). Hence developed sustainable supply chains for their businesses.  
Supported proposal development and oversaw the day to day execution of the project
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Identifying, Documenting and Reporting on European Union Excellence initiatives in Slovenia  
      Perform an evaluation and assessment of the European University Initiative (EUI), monitoring progress and identifying remaining barriers to institutional changes and cooperation in the R&I dimension
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant
